title: I got low priorty
body: i got low priorty cuz of the electricty has been shutting down alot in town these several months so i got lots of priorty bans and stuff but this time i was playing normaly and was doing the best on my team in the end of last couple of mins everything got shutdown i reconected a minute later the game ended and got 20 mins to wait for 5 games !!! wtf this is not my behavior riot ... pls do something if not... i will quit playing the game ...... i dont intend on waiting 20 mins per game for 5 games for something i didnt do ..... so yea...

replies.body:
Riot will not, under any circumstances, remove a low priority queue penalty from a person's account. If you are experiencing severe interruptions during play, then you are suggested to do something to prevent those interruptions or to only play when you know you won't be interrupted.

Since the electricity cutting out isn't really something you have any control over, then your best option is to play from an uninterruptable power source, such as battery or fuel. Then that depends on how much money you'd be willing to spend on such things, just to not get any more penalties.
